column2: "For the most part, but you don't need to say, <%me>'s name every time."
"Well as you can see, my newest assignment is Rela."
"He's showing me just how... amazing this place is."

"〔That's right!〕〔This place is amazing.〕
〔This is where I〕〔was born.〕"
"Hm? This is where you were born?"

"〔Yes〕〔Lord Kamitsu〕
〔gave birth to〕〔me here.〕
〔I'm the newest〕〔soul!〕"
"It's your imagination. So Rela, were you born looking that like?"

"〔Of course!〕
〔But Lord Kamitsu〕〔did mention that I was special somehow〕"

"〔My body〕〔is blessed by the stars〕
〔My soul〕〔has been refined〕
〔We are a mythology〕"

"〔But souls eaten by Darkers do not return〕
〔With out a soul〕〔There is no body〕"

"〔Lord Kamitsu〕〔said this〕
〔And that is why we must be thankful to ARKS〕"
"Lord Kamitsu, I still have yet to meet him directly."
